text: "Love of the Common People" is a 1967 song by The Four Preps and was not a hit. It was covered by The Everly Brothers and Joe Dolan. ==Paul Young version== In 1982, Paul Young released a version. It was taken from his debut studio album No Parlez. In 1983, it went to number 1 in Belgium, the Netherlands and Ireland and number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 3 in Austria and Switzerland, number 5 in Germany, number 8 in Australia and South Africa and number 10 in New Zealand. title: Love of the Common People
